Axosoft | AWS Cloud Engineer | Scottsdale, AZ | Full-time, ONSITE | https://axosoft.breezy.hr/p/8374d75eaaba-aws-cloud-engineer

Looking to hire someone dedicated to helping run/build/maintain/improve our AWS infrastructure.

Come join us in sunny Scottsdale, Arizona. We strive to be in the top 10% of Arizona-based companies for compensation and have pretty awesome benefits.

Feel free to email me with any questions. jamesq@axosoft.com
